Tableau | Palo Alto, Fulltime | Sr. Engineer/Dev Manager | ONSITE

Tableau's (http://tableau.com) extensibility team is growing and building a developer platform. Tableau's mission is to help people see and understand data and our team is building the APIs developers can use (http://developers.tableau.com) for everything from automation, custom visualizations, and connecting to new data sources.

If you're interested or want to know more please get in touch with me (Ben Lower, I'm leading the team) directly -> email (bklower@tableau.com), twitter (@benlower), SMS (+1 206.659.NINJA)
